Object.Description: Cerberus's Core, contains the very essence of Cerberus himself.

EffectInfo.name: Soul of Cerberus
EffectInfo.description: Immunity to Stun, Daze, and Slowed. Berserk for 5 seconds every 15 Seconds.

Object.Description: Cerberus's Right Claw, said to hold the souls of the dead.

EffectInfo.name: Killing Spree
EffectInfo.description: For Every 1500 Enemies Killed, Maximum HP Increases by 50 {Caps at 500}. Immunity to Slowed

Object.Description: Cereberus's Left Claw, said to hold the fury of the dead.

EffectInfo.name: Frenzy
EffectInfo.description: For every mob within a 10 distance radius, Attack goes up by 1.{Caps at 20}. Immunity to Dazed

Object.Description: The Gem that have the power of Life.

EffectInfo.name: Power of Life
EffectInfo.description: If your Life is below half, you regenerate the quintuple fast.

Object.Description: This Talisman has the power of mana.

EffectInfo.name: Power of Mana
EffectInfo.description: If your Mana is below the half, you regenerate the quintuple fast.

Object.Description: The hand of the Marble Colossus, it contains the power of the hand.

EffectInfo.name: Marble Power
EffectInfo.description: While holding this item, you will be immune to Unstable.

EffectInfo.name: On Handling
EffectInfo.description: While holding this, it will give you +100 HP.

EffectInfo.name: Looting:
EffectInfo.description: Holding this item gives you 20% of Loot! (One per Inventory).

Object.Description: This Talisman contain the Power of the Lucky, as long as you hold this, your luck will increase
This fragment contains the power of the Fire Elemental, use it with conscience and you will obtain unmatched power.
This fragment contains the power of the Water Elemental, use it with conscience and you will obtain unmatched power.
This fragment contains the power of the Wind Elemental, use it with conscience and you will obtain unmatched power.
This fragment contains the power of the Earth Elemental, use it with conscience and you will obtain unmatched power.
This fragment contains the power of the Earth Elemental and the Wind Elemental, use it with conscience and you will obtain unmatched power.
This fragment contains the power of the Fire Elemental and the Water Elemental, use it with conscience and you will obtain unmatched power.
This is the legendary fragment, it contains the power of all elementers together. The legend says that if you join it with another fragment, it will give you a weapon with incredible power.
